thread.title: Ex-CNN couple sue Motel 6 after shooting in Albuquerque
thread.title_full: Ex-CNN couple sue Motel 6 after shooting in Albuquerque

title: Ex-CNN couple sue Motel 6 after shooting in Albuquerque
text: > Entertainment Ex-CNN couple sue Motel 6 after shooting in Albuquerque FILE - In this July 1, 2015 file photo an Albuquerque Police Department officer collects evidence after a man was killed and another injured during what police say was an altercation between the two at a Motel 6 in Albuquerque, N.M. A pair of former CNN journalists are suing Motel 6 after a man tried to rob the couple at gunpoint and the encounter led to an exchange of gunfire that wounded one of the former reporters. (Adolphe Pierre-Louis/Albuquerque Journal via AP,File)
